page.title: 12Shops in Fletchertown.
page.content: Mrs. Henderson has to deal with the following business;Giro cheques, pensions and allowances,Saving Bank, Premium Bonds,postal orders,telephone bills,T.V.licenses,dog licenses,stamps and many other things.The Post Office shop is larger than my mam's but sells much the same things. There are also some mobile shops which visit Fletchertown regularly.There is a cake shop van that delivers to our shop and a fish van which comes every Thursday from Silloth.When he arrives he rings a hand bell to let people know he is in the village.These are some of the fish he sells from the back of his van;cod,haddock,smoked fish,plaice, whiting,and herrings.Stan Boucher runs a mobile shop from his shop in Aspatria. He visits eleven villages and travels out every day. In his own words he sells'everything from a pin.'
